page.title: 20AUTHORS
page.content:
This work was produced by:- {POTTERS GREEN PRIMARY SCHOOL} {WOODWAY PARK COMMUNITY COLLEGE {EBURNE PRIMARY SCHOOL {LYNG HALL COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL The area consisting of 12 1km x 1km squares was divided into blocks of three squares and each school studied these squares,also writing pages of text on subjects which they felt to be of interest or importance.
Hopefully those reading this information in the future will remember the haste with which it was prepared(BBC deadlines and school holidays) and the difficulties encountered in co-ordinating the whole project. {Chris Thatcher} Co-ordinator and Headteacher Potters Green School 10:7:1985
